articles.title: TSMC: Chip giant delays Arizona production in blow to Biden - BBC
articles.description: Taiwan-based TSMC says semiconductors manufacturing at its Arizona plant will no longer begin in 2024.
articles.content:
Chipmaking giant Taiwan Semiconductor (TSMC) has delayed the start of production at its factory in the US state of Arizona, in a setback to President Biden's technology ambitions.
The firm says chip… [+2218 chars]

articles.title: FTX sues Sam Bankman-Fried and former associates seeking more than $1bn - Financial Times
articles.description: Bankrupt crypto exchange’s lawsuit opens new front in effort to recoup assets sought by creditors and customers
articles.content: FTX, the bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange, has sued its founder Sam Bankman-Fried and three other former executives to claw back more than $1bn they allegedly misappropriated in the months leading up… [+2140 chars]
